goals.active: Defend Agrak Kraal from Uldek's Branded horde.
goals.complete: We joined forces with the ogres of Agrak Kraal and defended them from the horde of Branded creatures led by their corrputed former chieftain, Uldek. The kraal was destroyed in the attack, but we did save the ogres themselves. Chieftain Lagula agreed to join our fight against the Elder Dragons as soon as she helps her people establish a new kraal to call home.
